Tool

NameImport Erdas LAN/GIS
ID11
Author(c) 2005 by O.Conrad

Description

Import Erdas LAN/GIS files. The format analysis is based on the GRASS module i.in.erdas. Go to the GRASS GIS Hompage for more information.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Output
Grids (*)Grid list (optional output)GRIDS
Options
FileFile pathFILE
(*) optional
